category.name: Interface.Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: LOV_Row_Load_Count
preference.preference_description: Defines the maximum number of LOV values loaded on various user actions (filtering LOV values, scrolling towards the end of dropdown, sorting LOV values, etc.). A valid value is an integer equal to or greater than 15. The maximum allowed value is 2000 (in order to prevent performance degradation) and the default value is 50.
